author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Times China Holdings Says FY Contracted Sales For Year Of Rmb41.63 Billion
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Times China Holdings Ltd:
* FY CONTRACTED SALES FOR YEAR OF RMB41.63 BILLION, REPRESENTING AN INCREASE OF 41.9% AS COMPARED WITH LAST YEAR
* ‍PROFIT FOR YEAR OF RMB3.34 BILLION, UP 68.5%​ * FY TURNOVER FOR YEAR OF RMB23.11 BILLION, REPRESENTING AN INCREASE OF 42.6% AS COMPARED WITH LAST YEAR
* PROPOSED A FINAL DIVIDEND OF RMB41.43 CENTS PER SHARE FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
